title: These Are My Confessions
itunes:title: These Are My Confessions
description:
Today on th show we opened phone lines to hear our listeners confessions, after a listener called in for "Get It Off Your Chest" and revealed that he cheated on his wife. Moreover, Charalamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a Tennessee woman who complained about the critical race theory being taught in school because it makes the white people uncomfortable. Also, Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on th show we opened phone lines to hear our listeners confessions, after a listener called in for "Get It Off Your Chest" and revealed that he cheated on his wife. Moreover, Charalamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a Tennessee woman who complained about the critical race theory being taught in school because it makes the white people uncomfortable. Also, Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
